about.title: About Kolr
about.description: Kolr was created for designers, artists, and anyone who loves colors. Our mission is to make color palette creation simple, intuitive, and accessible to everyone.
about.story: Born from a passion for design and color theory, Kolr combines advanced algorithms with an intuitive interface to help you discover the perfect color combinations for your projects.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Kolr, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Kolr collects minimal data to provide you with the best experience. We only access your photos when you explicitly choose to use them for palette generation. Your photos are processed locally on your device and are never uploaded to our servers unless you choose to back up your gallery.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: Any data we collect is used solely to improve your experience with Kolr. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.camera: Camera: Used to capture photos for palette generation
permissions.photos: Photo Library: Used to access photos you select for palette creation
permissions.storage: Storage: Used to save your palettes locally on your device

privacy.contact: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at antoine.granier@protonmail.com
